comment.author: 8139976@N03
comment._content: The picture shows Russian POWs and their German guards at the Prisoner of War camp in Guben (Brandenburg, Germany), which was founded in September 1914. Literature: Peter, Andreas: Das "Russenlager" in Guben. - Potsdam : Brandenburgische Landeszentrale für politische Bildung, 1998. - 148 s., il., 21 cm. Brandenburgische Historische Hefte ; 10 www.niederlausitzerverlag.de/german/details.php?id=3&... review: www.niederlausitzerverlag.de/german/text.php?table=rezens... www.niederlausitzerverlag.de/german/products.php?category...

comment._content:
xiphophilos:

Thanks for giving more details on this photograph, and for providing citations to back up the information. Very much appreciated! We will add more information to the record.
